config.comments: Produce the InfluxDB line protocol, used ahead to POST them to API

entry.value:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def ff = session.get() if(!ff)return
def line = new StringBuilder() def slurper = new JsonSlurper() session.read(ff).withStream{inputStream -> def metric = slurper.parse(inputStream)
line.append("devops_data,")
line.append("project_name=").append(metric["project_name"]) .append(",environment=").append(metric["environment"]) .append(",build_successful=").append(metric["build_successful"]) .append(",build_result=").append(metric["build_result"]) .append(",build_number=").append(metric["build_number"]) .append(",part=").append(metric["part"]) .append(",version=").append(metric["version"])
line.append(" ")
line.append("build_result_ordinal=\"").append(metric["build_result_ordinal"]).append("\"") .append(",build_status_message=\"").append(metric["build_status_message"]).append("\"") .append(",build_time=").append(metric["build_time"]) .append(",last_stable_build=\"").append(metric["last_stable_build"]).append("\"") .append(",last_successful_build=\"").append(metric["last_successful_build"]).append("\"") .append(",project_build_health=").append(metric["project_build_health"])
line.append(" ")
line.append(metric["time"]) }
def ffOut = session.create() ffOut = session.write(ffOut, {outputStream -> outputStream.withWriter("UTF-8"){writer-> writer.append(line) } } as OutputStreamCallback )
ffOut = session.putAttribute(ffOut, "mime.type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
session.remove(ff)
session.transfer(ffOut, REL_SUCCESS)

config.comments: Gen a flowfile by every 10 seconds
Split the array of metris into flowfiles, on per array position
